Only the top two in each group are assured of advancing.
Egypt was second in Group B, two points behind group leader Cape Verde.
Ghana remained bottom of Group B with just one point, level with Mozambique.
Cape Verde and Mozambique play their second game of the tournament on Friday.
Ghana's Abdul Samed was taken off on a stretcher but later returned to the pitch.
The match saw three goals scored in the space of five minutes and 10 seconds during the second half.
